Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model

Class Deck

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.Deck
public class Deck extends Object
Represent the deck of the assistant cards in the game

    • getCardOrder

      public AssistantCard getCardOrder(int order)
      Return the assistant card of respective order in the deck
      Parameters:
      order - is the order of the assistant card that we want.
      Returns:
      the correspondence assistant card if there is in the deck, or it returns null.
